meanings.definition: A person who advocates for cooperation.
meanings.sent1: The cooperationists at the meeting suggested a compromise.
meanings.sent2: The cooperationists in the community always seek peaceful solutions.
meanings.sent3: The cooperationists decided to team up and bake cookies for the fundraiser.
meanings.sent4: In the forest of teamwork, the cooperationists are the mighty oaks standing together.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cooperationists holding hands symbolized unity and harmony.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who work together towards a common goal.
meanings.sent1: The cooperationists in the project collaborated effectively to achieve success.
meanings.sent2: The cooperationists in the sports team supported each other during the game.
meanings.sent3: The cooperationists organized a fun team-building activity to boost morale.
meanings.sent4: Like a flock of birds flying in formation, the cooperationists moved in sync towards their objective.
meanings.sent5: The bond between the cooperationists was unbreakable, like a chain linking them together.
